widget_google_adsense ( $  args,
$  widget_args = 1 
)

Generate the XHTML and JavaScript code for this widget.

Parameters:
Array $args Any additional code required to help this widget to conform to the active theme. Options include: before_widget, before_title, after_widget, and after_title.

widget_google_adsense_register (  ) 

Implementation of init action.

Put functions into one big function we'll call at the plugins_loaded action. This ensures that all required plugin functions are defined.

Definition at line 52 of file google-adsense.php.

00054   // Check for the required plugin functions. This will prevent fatal
00055   // errors occurring when you deactivate the dynamic-sidebar plugin.
00056   if (!function_exists('register_sidebar_widget')) {
00057     return FALSE; // Missing Automattic Sidebar Widgets plugin (became core in WordPress v2.3)

00060   // Initialize variables.
00061   $options = (array) get_option(WGA_CLEAN);
00062   $widget_ops = array('classname' => WGA_CLEAN, 'description' => __('A single advertisement unit. (Google limits to 3 per page.)'));
00063   $control_ops = array('width' => 220, 'height' => 50 * count(widget_google_adsense_options()), 'id_base' => WGA_CLEAN);
00064 
00065   // Register each instance of this widget.
00066   $id = '';
00067   foreach (array_keys($options) as $i) {
00068     $id = WGA_CLEAN .'-'. $i;
00069     // WARNING: wp_register_sidebar_widget() was not introduced until WordPress 2.2.
00070     // @TODO: Make backward-compatible? Find out how multiple widgets used to 
00071     //        work and switch back to that method if those functions are still 
00072     //        supported, even if deprecated.
00073     wp_register_sidebar_widget($id, WGA_NAME, 'widget_google_adsense', $widget_ops, array('number' => $i));
00074     wp_register_widget_control($id, WGA_NAME, 'widget_google_adsense_control', $control_ops, array('number' => $i));
00075   }
00076 
00077   // If there are no instances of this widget, register a generic widget.
00078   if (!$id) {
00079     wp_register_sidebar_widget(WGA_CLEAN .'-1', 'widget_google_adsense', WGA_CLEAN, $widget_ops, array('number' => -1));
00080     wp_register_widget_control(WGA_CLEAN .'-1', 'widget_google_adsense_control', $control_ops, array('number' => -1));
